nodes.bodyText: This class is fairly complex and, as far as I can see, there is no test coverage.
This private initialization may be hard to unit test, especially because static calls are used (SyncUtils.getLastSyncSuccess(..))
No test coverage for this class, as far as I can see
System.out to be removed or changed to Log

Is this abstract class still needed at all?
It seems to me that having an abstract class just with fields reduce a lot the readability of the code.
